title: Why do some champions chase non-targeted units?
body:
I played Kog'Maw, and found that when a minion (or enemy champion) was near enough, Kog'Maw would move forward and attack.  Sometimes this would result in death by turret or other undesired consequences.  But, when playing Varus, I noticed the same thing didn't happen.  Varus would not attack anything that wasn't in range. Both are marksmen.

Why?  

Is this something I should be able to predict when choosing a champion?

replies.body: AAing turned on, dynamic range with kog W. his range isnt defined so he might target things out of range when in normal range. walking too close.
do you have aa on in settings?
I never have this problem, you can turn off auto-auto attack in settings. most people who have it on constantly move around so it doesn't effect them
